website_summaries.verdict: This table offers commercial-grade quality and is built for years of use. Wipes clean and folds neatly for storage.
pros: Boasts a heavy-duty laminate top and rugged legs that are both adjustable and foldable
Practical rectangle shape is structured so chairs fit beneath neatly
Available in 6 sizes and 4 color options – walnut, oak, gray granite, or black granite
cons: Damaged tables upon arrival have been reported
Rare reports of uneven, wobbly legs

customer_reviews.title: Really love the table size
customer_reviews.text: Really love the table size, length and height. But, it comes in the cheap Chinese cardboard which is inadequate for shipping such a large, heavy item. Of course it had significant damage in two places at the edge but it's too big and heavy to return. I just turned the damaged edge towards tophe wall. The dark color gets really "oily" and smudges easily like a cellphone glass. That is kind of weird. Functionally, just what I needed. About $70 less than any other vendor. But, do expect so,e damage.

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to keep this, it is the perfect size. As other reviewers experienced, one corner was smashed due to the inefficient packaging. On further inspection the legs on one side were coming apart from the top and there was a crack in one of the modesty panels. On the positive, it seems very sturdy. I would note that if you are going to move this frequently it is quite heavy. I wish it had worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Fizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer Tables
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I bought for home. They are commercial quality (hence the cost), but they work very well for us. We are a large family, so I set them up as a kind of mini-computer lab against the wall for our kids. We have the 96" and 72" ones. Very sturdy but don't take up any more space than they need to.
customer_reviews.author: Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Service
customer_reviews.text: The delivery service used for these deliveries opted to change the delivery time, creating a major distribution. Amazon and Correll should find ethical and reputable delivery services.
customer_reviews.author: M Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Expensive desk packed in weak cardboard box
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the table would have suited me perfectly, had it not arrived with two completely smashed corners and scratches all over the top. This one is going back. Not taking a second chance on another.
customer_reviews.author: Zak Forsman

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. Just pop the legs down, screw on the feet and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki L.

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed with all the damage
customer_reviews.text: Every single one purchased (4 out of 4) was very visibly damaged. Embarrassed to display the product. "simply returning" a 70 pound 8 foot long table is not reasonable. I strongly do not recommend buying any furniture from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Former Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the table other than the damage
customer_reviews.text: Three of the four tables were damaged. The boxes were not damaged, however the table edges were bent/smashed in several places. I love the table other than the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: This table is higher quality than many on the market and arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: TB, Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Arurdy
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect - just as described. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy and clean looking. definitely spruced up our training room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Table is of excellent quality and came packaged well and accembled.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad W.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Engineering
customer_reviews.text: When the screw in leveling/wear pads are added the table's legs DO NOT FOLD FLAT as advertised. Extremely poor engineering.
customer_reviews.author: J of Oak Woods

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy and not level and poorly designed. Dis not work for me in my application. Maybe better suited for others..
customer_reviews.author: michael ogle

customer_reviews.title: Great table for my office ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table to use as a desk. So far, so good. Works great for me with plenty of desk space. Some reviews complained about damage during shipping. Mine arrived with the box beat to hell but no damage to the contents. I caught it on sale, so a good buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Luther Cary

customer_reviews.title: Minimally ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: Basic table with fold down legs. One side was already broken off coming out of the box. They are also not very sturdy and wobble quite a bit side to side. For basic light weight duty they might work but I planned on using them in my classroom. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the tables
customer_reviews.text: They were delivered as promised and look great in our conference room.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA L PLASCH

product_meta.title: Correll SP1872PX-07 High Pressure Laminate Classroom, Training or Seminar Table with Folding Panel Leg, Rectangular, 18"x72", Seats 3, Black Granite
product_meta.description:
Size:18" x 72"| Style:Single Table| Color:Black Granite

Correll Panel Leg Folding Classroom Training and Seminar Tables

• Part No. SP1872PX-07

• Comfortably seats 3 people

• Black Granite high pressure laminate surface, resists scratches and stains and has a hard, flat writing surface

• Heavy Duty 3\4" thick high density particle board with backer sheet 

• 18"x72"

• 1"x2" Steel offset legs for maximum leg room

• Unique Knife lock folding legs makes the underneath completely open for maximum leg room and comfort

• Stays open securely with automatic lock open legs 

• Black T-Mold edging

• Nylon guides on legs

• Classy Panel Leg design

• Heavy Duty construction ideal in public and commercial spaces including schools and places of worship

• Made in the USA

YOU CAN COUNT ON CORRELL:

Correll was established in 1969 and has been in business for over 40 years. With our outstanding Customer Service, innovative new product lines, and the largest selection of Folding Tables available from any manufacturer, now, more than ever, you can count on Correll. In an age where it seems like everything is imported, over 90% of Correll products are still MADE IN THE USA at our factory in Arkansas
feature_bullets: 3/4" thick High-Pressure Laminate Top with Backer Sheet
Steel Folding Legs with Adjustable Nylon Glides and Panel to match the top
Work Surface is same material used on kitchen counter tops
